languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Шанс попадания{/g} не может быть больше 95%. Каждый 1% выше 95% попадания трансформируется в 1% шанса совершить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}. Если враг находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}, у него есть шанс воспользоваться им — частичные укрытия дают 35% шанс избежать атаки, полные укрытия повышают его до 60%. Кроме того, этот шанс может меняться под действием {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} персонажа, а также положительных или {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g}. Если цели не удалось воспользоваться укрытием, она попробует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} атакующего)%. Общий шанс уклонения может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, дающих {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} или штрафы к уклонению цели либо снижению уклонения атакующего. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если не смогла воспользоваться укрытием и уклониться от одиночного выстрела.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

traits.locale_text: Шанс попадания не может быть больше 95%. Каждый 1% выше 95% попадания трансформируется в 1% шанса совершить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}. Если враг находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}укрытием{/g}, у него есть шанс воспользоваться им — частичные укрытия дают 35% шанс избежать атаки, полные укрытия повышают его до 60%. Кроме того, этот шанс может меняться под действием способностей персонажа, а также {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}положительных{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативных эффектов{/g}. Если цели не удалось воспользоваться укрытием, она попробует {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклониться{/g} от атаки. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} противника)%. Значение этого показателя также может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, влияющих на шанс уклонения, и в зависимости от параметра {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} используемого оружия. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}, если не смогла воспользоваться укрытием и уклониться от одиночного выстрела.

Шанс попадания не может быть больше 95%. Каждый 1% выше 95% попадания трансформируется в 1% шанса совершить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}. Если враг находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}укрытием{/g}, у него есть шанс воспользоваться им — частичные укрытия дают 35% шанс избежать атаки, полные укрытия повышают его до 60%. Кроме того, этот шанс может меняться под действием способностей персонажа, а также {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}положительных{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативных эффектов{/g}. Если цели не удалось воспользоваться укрытием, она попробует {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклониться{/g} от атаки. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} противника)%. Значение этого показателя также может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, влияющих на шанс уклонения, и в зависимости от параметра {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} используемого оружия. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}, если не смогла воспользоваться укрытием и уклониться от одиночного выстрела.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Шанс попадания{/g} не может быть больше 95%. Каждый 1% выше 95% попадания трансформируется в 1% шанса совершить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}. Если враг находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}, у него есть шанс воспользоваться им — частичные укрытия дают 35% шанс избежать атаки, полные укрытия повышают его до 60%. Кроме того, этот шанс может меняться под действием {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} персонажа, а также положительных или {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g}. Если цели не удалось воспользоваться укрытием, она попробует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} атакующего)%. Общий шанс уклонения может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, дающих {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} или штрафы к уклонению цели либо снижению уклонения атакующего. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если не смогла воспользоваться укрытием и уклониться от одиночного выстрела.

traits.locale_text: Hit chance cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' abilities in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (10 + target {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g})%. This value can also change depending on abilities and effects that influence dodge chance and also depends on the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} parameter of the weapon used. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

Hit chance cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' abilities in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (10 + target {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g})%. This value can also change depending on abilities and effects that influence dodge chance and also depends on the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} parameter of the weapon used. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} kann nicht größer als 95% sein. Jedes Prozent Trefferchance über 95% hinaus verwandelt sich in eine um 1% erhöhte Chance, einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu erzielen. Wenn sich der Gegner hinter {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} befindet, hat er eine Chance, diese erfolgreich zu nutzen – bei teilweiser Deckung beträgt die Chance, einem Angriff auszuweichen, 35%, bei voller Deckung 60%. Diese Chance kann von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Charakters sowie von positiven und {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekten{/g} beeinflusst werden. Wenn das Ziel nicht in Deckung geht, versucht es stattdessen, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}. Die Grundausweichchance beträgt (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Ziels − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)%. Die Gesamt-Ausweichchance kann durch Fähigkeiten und Effekte modifiziert werden, die einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} bzw. Malus auf das Ausweichen des Ziels bzw. die Ausweichen-Reduktion des Angreifers mit sich bringen. Das Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wenn es nicht in Deckung geht oder dem Einzelschuss-Angriff nicht ausweicht.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} kann nicht größer als 95% sein. Jede um 1% höhere {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Trefferchance{/g} über 95% verwandelt sich in eine um 1% erhöhte Chance, einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu erzielen. Wenn sich der Gegner hinter {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} befindet, hat er eine Chance, diese erfolgreich zu nutzen – bei teilweiser Deckung beträgt die Chance, einem Angriff auszuweichen, 35%, bei voller Deckung 60%. Außerdem kann sich diese Chance abhängig von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Charakters sowie von positiven und {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekten{/g} ändern. Wenn das Ziel nicht in Deckung geht, wird es versuchen, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}auszuweichen {/g}. Die Grundausweichchance beträgt (10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Ziels –{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Angreifers)%. Dieser Wert kann sich auch in Abhängigkeit von Fähigkeiten und Effekten ändern, die die Ausweichchance beeinflussen, und hängt auch vom {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierungs{/g}-Parameter der verwendeten Waffe ab. Das Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g}, wenn es nicht in Deckung geht oder dem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff nicht ausweicht.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} kann nicht größer als 95% sein. Jedes Prozent Trefferchance über 95% hinaus verwandelt sich in eine um 1% erhöhte Chance, einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu erzielen. Wenn sich der Gegner hinter {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} befindet, hat er eine Chance, diese erfolgreich zu nutzen – bei teilweiser Deckung beträgt die Chance, einem Angriff auszuweichen, 35%, bei voller Deckung 60%. Diese Chance kann von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Charakters sowie von positiven und {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekten{/g} beeinflusst werden. Wenn das Ziel nicht in Deckung geht, versucht es stattdessen, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}. Die Grundausweichchance beträgt (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Ziels — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)%. Die Gesamt-Ausweichchance kann durch Fähigkeiten und Effekte modifiziert werden, die einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} bzw. Malus auf das Ausweichen des Ziels bzw. die Ausweichen-Reduktion des Angreifers mit sich bringen. Das Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wenn es nicht in Deckung geht oder dem Einzelschuss-Angriff nicht ausweicht.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} ne peuvent pas être supérieures à 95 %. Au-delà de 95 %, chaque augmentation de 1 % des chances de toucher se transforme en une augmentation de 1 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}. Si l'ennemi est {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}, il a une chance de se protéger. Une couverture partielle confère 35 % de chances d'éviter une attaque, contre 60 % pour une couverture totale. Par ailleurs, ces chances peuvent varier en fonction des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du personnage et de différents {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} et positifs. Si la cible ne parvient pas à se mettre à couvert, elle tente d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} l'attaque. Les chances d'esquive de base sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également varier en fonction des capacités et des effets appliquant des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ou des pénalités à l'esquive de la cible ou à la réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} si elle ne parvient pas à se mettre à couvert ou à esquiver l'attaque au coup par coup.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} ne peuvent pas être supérieures à 95 %. Au-delà de 95 %, chaque augmentation de 1 % des chances de toucher se transforme en une augmentation de 1 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}. Si l'ennemi est {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}, il a une chance de se protéger. Une couverture partielle confère 35 % de chances d'éviter une attaque, contre 60 % pour une couverture totale. Par ailleurs, ces chances peuvent varier en fonction des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du personnage et de différents {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} et positifs. Si la cible ne parvient pas à se mettre à couvert, elle tente d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} l'attaque. Les chances d'esquive de base sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également varier en fonction des capacités et des effets appliquant des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ou des pénalités à l'esquive de la cible ou à la réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} si elle ne parvient pas à se mettre à couvert ou à esquiver l'attaque au coup par coup.

Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} ne peuvent pas être supérieures à 95 %. Au-delà de 95 %, chaque augmentation de 1 % des chances d'infliger un coup se transforme en une augmentation de 1 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}. Si l'ennemi est {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}, il a une chance de se protéger. Une couverture partielle confère 35 % de chances d'éviter une attaque, contre 60 % pour une couverture totale. Par ailleurs, ces chances peuvent varier en fonction des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du personnage et de différents {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} et positifs. Si la cible ne parvient pas à se mettre à couvert, elle tente d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} l'attaque. Les chances d'esquive de base sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible - {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également varier en fonction des capacités et des effets appliquant des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ou des pénalités à l'esquive de la cible ou à la réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} si elle ne parvient pas à se mettre à couvert ou à esquiver l'attaque au coup par coup.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}最高只能达到95%。如果命中率超过95%，每超过1%，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}便会提高1%。 如果目标躲在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面，则目标可以使用掩体进行掩护。半身掩体有35%的几率保护目标，而全身掩体的保护几率提高到60%。此外，命中率还会根据角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}{/g}，以及各种效果进行增减。如果目标没有受到掩体保护，则会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击。基础闪避率为（30+目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}。目标的闪避率与攻击者的闪避减免还会受其他能力或效果增减，继而进一步影响最终闪避率。 如果目标未能使用掩体保护自己，也未能闪避单发射击，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}最高只能达到95%。如果命中率超过95%，每超过1%，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}便会提高1%。 如果目标躲在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面，则目标可以使用掩体进行掩护。半身掩体有35%的几率保护目标，而全身掩体的保护几率提高到60%。此外，命中率还会根据角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}{/g}，以及各种效果进行增减。如果目标没有受到掩体保护，则会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击。基础闪避率为（30+目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}。目标的闪避率与攻击者的闪避减免还会受其他能力或效果增减，继而进一步影响最终闪避率。 如果目标未能使用掩体保护自己，也未能闪避单发射击，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} nunca puede superar el 95 %. Cada 1 % de probabilidad de impacto por encima del 95 % se convierte en un 1 % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}. Si el enemigo está a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubierto{/g}, tiene una posibilidad de usar la cobertura. La cobertura parcial da una probabilidad del 35 % de evitar un ataque, y la completa, un 60 %. Esta probabilidad también puede variar en función de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de los personajes, así como los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} y positivos. Si el objetivo no logra cubrirse, intentará {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} el ataque. La probabilidad de esquiva básica es de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del atacante) %. La probabilidad de esquiva total puede cambiar por capacidades y efectos que proporcionen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} o penalizaciones a la esquiva del objetivo o la reducción de esquiva del atacante. El objetivo recibe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} si no consigue ponerse a cubierto ni esquivar el ataque de un solo disparo.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

traits.locale_text: La probabilidad de impacto nunca puede superar el 95 %. Cada 1 % de probabilidad de impacto por encima del 95 % se convierte en un 1 % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g}. Si el enemigo está {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}a cubierto{/g}, tiene la oportunidad de aprovecharlo: la cobertura parcial otorga un 35 % de probabilidades de evitar el ataque, y la completa, un 60 %. Ten en cuenta que esta probabilidad puede variar en función de las capacidades de los personajes y de sus efectos {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positivos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativos{/g}. Si el objetivo no puede ocultarse tras una cobertura, intentará {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} el ataque. La probabilidad de esquiva base es (10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del atacante) %. Este valor también puede verse modificado por capacidades y efectos que influyan en la probabilidad de esquiva y por el parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del arma utilizada. El objetivo recibe {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} si no consigue ponerse a cubierto ni esquivar el ataque de un solo disparo.

languages.original_text: Hit chance cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' abilities in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:PositiveEffect}positive{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (10 + target {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g})%. This value can also change depending on abilities and effects that influence dodge chance and also depends on the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} parameter of the weapon used. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}は95%より高くはならない。95%より上の命中率については、1%上昇するごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出す確率の1%上昇に変換される。 {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の後ろに敵がいる場合、敵は一定確率でそれを利用できる。部分遮蔽では攻撃回避の確率は35%で、完全遮蔽の場合、確率は60%に増加する。さらに、この確率はキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}やプラスおよび{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}により変動する。遮蔽物に隠れるのに失敗した場合、ターゲットは攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を試みる。基本の回避率は(30+ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}−アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g})%。合計回避率はさらに{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与えるアビリティや効果、およびターゲットの回避ペナルティやアタッカーの回避減少の影響も受ける。 ターゲットが遮蔽物に隠れたり単発射撃の攻撃を回避するのに失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Hit chance{/g} cannot be greater than 95%. Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}は95%より高くはならない。95%より上の命中率については、1%上昇するごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出す確率の1%上昇に変換される。 {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の後ろに敵がいる場合、敵は一定確率でそれを利用できる。部分遮蔽では攻撃回避の確率は35%で、完全遮蔽の場合、確率は60%に増加する。さらに、この確率はキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}やプラスおよび{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}により変動する。遮蔽物に隠れるのに失敗した場合、ターゲットは攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を試みる。基本の回避率は(30+ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}−アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g})%。合計回避率はさらに{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与えるアビリティや効果、およびターゲットの回避ペナルティやアタッカーの回避減少の影響も受ける。 ターゲットが遮蔽物に隠れたり単発射撃の攻撃を回避するのに失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Vuruş olasılığı{/g} %95'ten büyük olamaz. %95'in üzerindeki her ek %1'lik vuruş olasılığı, %1'lik ek {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirebilme olasılığına dönüşür. Düşman bir {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperin{/g} arkasındaysa onu kullanma olasılığı doğar. Kısmi siper, saldırıdan sakınmak için %35 olasılık verirken tam siperde bu olasılık %60'a çıkar. Ayrıca bu olasılık, karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerinin{/g} yanı sıra olumlu veya {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkilere{/g} bağlı olarak değişiklik gösterebilir. Hedef, siper almayı başaramazsa saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmaya{/g} çalışır. Taban kaçınma olasılığı, %(30 + hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği − saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g}) kadardır. Toplam kaçınma olasılığı, hedefin kaçınmasına veya saldırganın kaçınma azaltımına {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} veya ceza puanı veren kabiliyet ve etkilerle daha da değişikliğe uğrayabilir. Hedef, tek atış saldırısına karşı siper almayı veya kaçınma hareketi yapmayı başaramazsa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır.

Every 1% increased hit chance above 95% transforms into an increased 1% chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. If the enemy is behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, they have a chance to successfully use it — partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack, full cover increases it to 60%. In addition, this chance can change depending on characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} as well as positive and {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If the target fails to take cover, it will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if it fails to take cover or dodge the single-shot attack.
